title: Welcome to My Tech Notes
content: This is a placeholder for future technical notes, papers, and project documentation. What is this?This section is dedicated to: Research papers I’m reading. Course notes from NJU and HKUST. Technical tutorials and dev logs.

title: Hello World
content: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick StartCreate a new post$ hexo new My New Post More info: Writing Run server$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment

title: About Me
content: English | 中文 .lang-btn { border: none; background: none; cursor: pointer; font-size: 1rem; padding: 4px 8px; border-radius: 4px; transition: all 0.2s ease; color: var(--text-p3); } .lang-btn.active { color: var(--text-p1); font-weight: bold; background: var(--card-hover); } .lang-btn:hover { color: var(--text-p1); } /* Hide duplicate TOC entries initially */ ZHU YEHANG 📧 231880098@smail.nju.edu.cn EDUCATIONNanjing University — Sep 2023 – PresentB.Eng. in Intelligent Software Engineering GPA: 4.515.0 (Major GPA 4.475.0) Rank: 11153 (Top 7.2%) The Hong Kong University of Science and Technology — Sep 2025 – Dec 2025UG Exchange Program (Computer Science)Selected Coursework: Deep Learning in Computer Vision (COMP4471, Prof. Qifeng Chen) — Grade: A Cryptography (COMP3631, Prof. Cunsheng Ding) — Grade: A- Electronic Information Technology (ELEC1010, Prof. Xiaomeng Li) — Grade: A Yangzhou High School of Jiangsu Province — Sep 2020 – Jun 2023 National College Entrance Examination (2023, Jiangsu): 669750(Chinese 125, Math 128, English 139, Physics 93, Chemistry 96, Biology 88) CERTIFICATIONS ACHIEVEMENTS CET-4: 684, CET-6: 603 IELTS: 8.0 (Listening 8.5, Speaking 7.5, Reading 8.5, Writing 6.5) — Oct 2023 Outstanding Freshman Award, Nanjing University (2023) People’s Scholarship (CNY 2000, Nov 2024) Yan Baoling Overseas Exchange Scholarship (Excellent Award) (fall 2025) National Scholarship (Fall 2025) WORK EXPERIENCESummer Intern | Shanghai Fanyun Information Technology Co., Ltd. Contributed to the early-stage development of the company’s intelligent QA system. Responsibilities included writing system design documentation, implementing backend logic and API testing based on the Dify platform, and creating front-end prototypes. RESEARCH EXPERIENCESemTabla: A Human-in-the-Loop Framework for Semantic Enrichment and Validation of Data Tables (Submitted to ACM CHI 2026) — May 2025 – Sep 2025 Developed an interactive system integrating hierarchical extraction and critical sampling to address missing business semantics in data tables. Verified that extracted semantics significantly enhance LLMs’ reasoning capabilities through user studies and quantitative experiments. Contribution: 3rd Author. Collaborated on system design, literature review, and user study analysis. Advisors: Ke Xu (徐科), Zhuochen Jin (金卓宸) PROJECTSSparse Density Adaptive Attention for 3D Object Detection | HKUST Course Project (COMP4471) Core Contributor | Grade: A Implemented a Sparse Density Adaptive Attention (SDAA) module integrated with PointPillars to address point cloud sparsity. “Shapez-like Factory (C++)” | Course Project, Advanced C++ Programming, NJU Developed a simplified factory simulation game inspired by “Shapez” using QT. GitHub “Tomato Bookstore (Spring Boot + Vue)” | Course Project, Software Engineering Computing, NJU Developed an online e-commerce platform for “Tomato Books” to sell physical books. GitHub “SportRoomOnline (Midway + React)” | Course Project, Web Development, NJU (May 2024 – Jun 2024) A modern sports activity management platform. GitHub Automated Email Management System based on Cradle | National-level Innovation Training Program Project Aims to generalize and integrate various functionalities of an email management system. TECHNICAL SKILLS Programming: Python, C++, Java, JavaScript, SQL Frameworks Libraries: PyTorch, Qt, Spring Boot, Vue.js, React Tools Platforms: Git, Linux, Docker, LaTeX ZHU YEHANG 南京大学 · 软件工程（智能软件）本科 📧 23188098@smail.nju.edu.cn📧 3035745730@qq.com📍 Yangzhou, Jiangsu🐙 github.comlajoyazyh 教育背景南京大学 · 软件工程（智能软件）本科 GPA：4.475.0（专业课），排名：11153（Top 7.19%）；4.515.0（全部课程） 2023年9月 – 至今 香港科技大学 · 计算机科学交换生 选修课程：计算机视觉深度学习 (A)、密码学 (A-)、电子与信息技术 (A) 2025年9月 – 2025年12月 江苏省扬州中学 · 理科 高考（2023，江苏）：669750（语文125，数学128，英语139，物理93，化学96，生物88） 2020年9月 – 2023年6月 荣誉与证书 CET-4：684 · CET-6：603 IELTS：总分 8.0（听 8.5 说 7.5 读 8.5 写 6.5） · 2023年10月 南京大学新生学院优秀学生 · 2024年6月 人民奖学金（2000元）· 2024年11月 香港科技大学工学院交换生 Offer · 2025年秋季 顾保玲海外交流奖学金 · 卓越奖 · 2025年秋季 国家奖学金 · 2025年秋季 工作与实践经历暑期实习 · 上海凡云信息科技有限公司 早期智能问答系统研发：撰写系统设计文档；基于 Dify 平台实现后端逻辑与 API 测试；前端原型设计 科研经历SemTabla：面向数据表语义增强与验证的人机协同框架（已提交 ACM CHI 2026） 2025年5月 – 2025年9月 开发了一个集成层次化提取与关键采样技术的交互式系统，解决了数据表缺乏明确业务语义的问题。 通过用户研究与定量实验，验证了提取的语义能显著增强大模型的推理能力。 贡献：第三作者。参与系统设计、文献综述及用户研究分析。 指导教师：徐科老师，金卓宸老师 项目经历Sparse Density Adaptive Attention for 3D Object Detection | HKUST 课程项目 (COMP4471) 核心贡献者 | 成绩：A 实现了集成到 PointPillars 中的稀疏密度自适应注意力 (SDAA) 模块，以解决点云稀疏性问题。 “Shapez-like Factory (C++)” | NJU 高级程序设计课程项目 灵感来自“Shapez”的工厂仿真小游戏，包含采矿、传送带、切割器与设备升级等机制。 源码 “Tomato Bookstore (Spring Boot + Vue)” | NJU 软工二课程项目 图书电商平台：用户注册登录、浏览与购买；管理员管理书籍信息、订单与库存。 源码 “SportRoomOnline (Midway + React)” | NJU Web 开发课程项目 现代化体育活动管理平台。 源码 基于 CRADLE 的自动化邮件管理系统 | 国家级大创项目 目标：泛化集成邮件系统功能，利用自反与学习能力提升处理准确率与满意度。 技术技能 编程语言: Python, C++, Java, JavaScript, SQL 框架与库: PyTorch, Qt, Spring Boot, Vue.js, React 工具与平台: Git, Linux, Docker, LaTeX // Define TOC mapping const tocIdsEn = [ 'EDUCATION', 'CERTIFICATIONS-ACHIEVEMENTS', 'WORK-EXPERIENCE', 'RESEARCH-EXPERIENCE', 'PROJECTS', 'TECHNICAL-SKILLS' ]; const tocIdsZh = [ '教育背景', '荣誉与证书', '工作与实践经历', '科研经历', '项目经历', '技术技能' ]; function updateTOC(lang) { // Try to find TOC links. Hexo stellar usually uses .toc-link // We try to match the href attribute const allLinks = document.querySelectorAll('.toc-link'); if (!allLinks.length) return; allLinks.forEach(link => { const href = link.getAttribute('href'); if (!href) return; // Remove # const id = decodeURIComponent(href.substring(1)); // Check if this ID belongs to EN or ZH list // Note: Hexo might add numbers or suffixes, so we check inclusion // A simpler way: Hide based on context if possible, but structure prevents it. // We check if the ID matches our known headers. let isEn = tocIdsEn.some(key => id.includes(key)); let isZh = tocIdsZh.some(key => id.includes(key)); if (lang === 'en') { if (isZh) { link.closest('.toc-item') ? link.closest('.toc-item').style.display = 'none' : link.style.display = 'none'; } else if (isEn) { link.closest('.toc-item') ? link.closest('.toc-item').style.display = 'block' : link.style.display = 'block'; } } else { if (isEn) { link.closest('.toc-item') ? link.closest('.toc-item').style.display = 'none' : link.style.display = 'none'; } else if (isZh) { link.closest('.toc-item') ? link.closest('.toc-item').style.display = 'block' : link.style.display = 'block'; } } }); } function showLang(lang) { const en = document.getElementById('resume-en'); const zh = document.getElementById('resume-zh'); const btnEn = document.getElementById('btn-en'); const btnZh = document.getElementById('btn-zh'); if (lang === 'en') { en.style.display = 'block'; zh.style.display = 'none'; btnEn.classList.add('active'); btnZh.classList.remove('active'); } else { en.style.display = 'none'; zh.style.display = 'block'; btnEn.classList.remove('active'); btnZh.classList.add('active'); } // Update TOC after a short delay to ensure DOM is ready if it's dynamic setTimeout(() => updateTOC(lang), 50); } // Initialize on load document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', () => { showLang('en'); });

title: 2023夏 · 武汉之旅
content: 时间：2023年夏天人物：朱业航 张志文主题：打卡武汉 - 从汉阳造到光谷，感受这座英雄城市的烟火气。 这次旅行虽然行程紧凑，但我们几乎打卡了武汉所有标志性的地标。从长江大桥的晚风，到粮道街的过早；从黄鹤楼的古韵，到东湖的绿道。 每一站都是青春的注脚。 旅程目录 📅 Day 1: 跨越长江的黄昏 汉阳造 - 晴川阁 - 长江大桥 - 户部巷 🏯 Day 2: 历史的回响 黄鹤楼 - 古德寺 - 极地海洋公园 🥯 Day 3: 过早与求学路 粮道街 - 东湖 - 华中科技大学
